mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT BH.BHNO, BH.COUNT_VIEWERS, BH.BCNO, BH.COUNT_RECOMMENDATION, BH.BROAD_TITLE, BH.BROAD_PWD, BH.BROAD_CATEGORY, BH.ADULT, BH.BH_STATUS, BC.BROAD_ADDRESS, BC.BCINTRO, BC.MNO, BC.ENDING_COMMENT FROM BROAD_HIS BH, BROAD_CENTER BC WHERE BH.BCNO = BC.BCNO AND BH.BCNO = #{mno} ORDER BY BH.BHNO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BROAD_HIS VALUES(SEQ_BHNO.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, NULL, 'Y', NULL, #{bcno}, NULL, #{title}, #{pwd}, #{category}, #{adult})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PNO, P.SNO, P.MNO, P.CNO, P.PTYPE, C.JBNO, TO_CHAR(C.C_SDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS C_SDATE, C.C_EDATE, C.PERPRICE, M.MID, M.NICK_NAME FROM MEMBER M, PARTNER P, CONTRACT C, STREAMER S WHERE P.MNO = M.MNO AND P.SNO = S.SNO AND P.CNO = C.CNO AND P.SNO = #{mno} AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BLNO,M.MID,M.NICK_NAME,TO_CHAR(BL_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS BL_DATE FROM MEMBER M,MEMBER ST,BLACKLIST B WHERE M.MNO = B.MNO AND ST.MNO = B.SNO AND ST.MNO = #{mno} AND BL_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT count(*) as 인원수 FROM MEMBER M,MEMBER ST,BLACKLIST B WHERE M.MNO = B.MNO AND ST.MNO = B.SNO AND ST.MNO = #{mno} AND BL_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BLNO,M.MID,M.NICK_NAME,TO_CHAR(BL_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')AS BL_DATE FROM MEMBER M,MEMBER ST,BLACKLIST B WHERE M.MNO = B.MNO AND ST.MNO = B.SNO AND ST.MNO = #{mno} AND BLNO = #{blno} AND BL_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT P.PNO, P.SNO, P.MNO, P.CNO, P.PTYPE, C.JBNO, TO_CHAR(C.C_SDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS C_SDATE, C.C_EDATE, C.PERPRICE, M.MID, M.NICK_NAME, M.PHONE FROM MEMBER M, PARTNER P, CONTRACT C, STREAMER S WHERE P.MNO = M.MNO AND P.SNO = S.SNO AND P.CNO = C.CNO AND M.MNO = #{mno} AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM BROAD_CENTER BC, MEMBER M WHERE BC.MNO = M.MNO AND M.MNO = #{mno} AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BRO_BOARD BB, BROAD_CENTER BC, MEMBER M WHERE M.MNO=BC.MNO AND BC.BCNO=BB.BCNO AND M.MNO=#{smno} AND BB.BBTYPE=#{type} AND BB.BB_STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM (select ROWNUM RNUM2, P.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, L.* FROM ( SELECT B.BNO BNO, B.BTITLE BTITLE, B.BCONTENT BCONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.WRITTEN_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') WRITTEN_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE MODIFY_DATE, B.BCOUNT BCOUNT, B.BTYPE BTYPE, B.BWRITER BWRITER, B.B_STATUS STATUS, M2.MNO MMNO, M2.NICK_NAME MNICK_NAME, M.MNO SMNO, BB.BBNO BBNO FROM BOARD B, BRO_BOARD BB, BROAD_CENTER BC, MEMBER M, MEMBER M2 WHERE M.MNO = BC.MNO AND BC.BCNO = BB.BCNO AND BB.BBNO = B.BBNO AND B.BWRITER = M2.MNO AND M.MNO = #{smno} AND B.B_STATUS=7 ORDER BY B.BNO) L) ORDER BY RNUM DESC) P) WHERE RNUM2 BETWEEN #{paging.start} AND #{paging.last}

SELECT S.MNO, M.MID, M.NICK_NAME, M.RECEIVED_LIKES, A.CHANGE_NAME FROM STREAMER S JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN ATT_MANAGE AM ON(S.MNO = AM.MNO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(AM.ATTNO = A.ATTNO) WHERE M.M_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY M.RECEIVED_LIKES DESC

SELECT S.MNO, M.MID, M.NICK_NAME, M.RECEIVED_LIKES, A.CHANGE_NAME FROM STREAMER S JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN ATT_MANAGE AM ON(S.MNO = AM.MNO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(AM.ATTNO = A.ATTNO) WHERE M.NICK_NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' AND M.M_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY M.RECEIVED_LIKES DESC

SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.WRITTEN_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS WRITTEN_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.BCOUNT, B.BTYPE, B.BBNO, B.BWRITER, B.B_STATUS, M.NICK_NAME, M2.MNO SMNO, M2.NICK_NAME SNICK_NAME, BC.BCNO FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M, BROAD_CENTER BC, MEMBER M2, BRO_BOARD BB WHERE M.MNO = B.BWRITER AND B.BBNO = BB.BBNO AND BB.BCNO = BC.BCNO AND BC.MNO = M2.MNO AND B.BNO=#{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, #{type}, 'N', NULL, NULL, #{bbno}, #{mno}, NULL, 'N', NULL, 7)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, L.* FROM ( SELECT B.BNO BNO, B.BTITLE BTITLE, B.BCONTENT BCONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.WRITTEN_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') WRITTEN_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE MODIFY_DATE, B.BCOUNT BCOUNT, B.BTYPE BTYPE, B.BWRITER BWRITER, B.B_STATUS STATUS, M2.MNO MMNO, M2.NICK_NAME MNICK_NAME, M.MNO SMNO, BB.BBNO BBNO FROM BOARD B, BRO_BOARD BB, BROAD_CENTER BC, MEMBER M, MEMBER M2 WHERE M.MNO = BC.MNO AND BC.BCNO = BB.BCNO AND BB.BBNO = B.BBNO AND B.BWRITER = M2.MNO AND M.MNO = #{smno} AND B.B_STATUS=7 ORDER BY B.BNO) L)
